## Properties

| Property           | Attribute            | Description                                                                                             | Type                                          | Default                 |
| ------------------ | -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| `legendPosition`   | `legend-position`    | Position when the legend should be placed                                                               | `LegendPosition.bottom \| LegendPosition.top` | `LegendPosition.bottom` |
| `progressBarItems` | `progress-bar-items` | Items which should be displayed in the progress-bar and in the legend, the values should sum up to 100% | `ProgressBarItems[] \| string`                | `undefined`             |
| `subtitle`         | `subtitle`           | Subtitles for the progress-bar                                                                          | `Subtitle \| string`                          | `undefined`             |
| `totalAmount`      | `total-amount`       | Total amount: Summary of all data in the progress bar                                                   | `TotalAmount \| string`                       | `undefined`             |
